DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , comparative , prospective pivotal study demonstrate AL-SENSE indicate whether wetness sense pregnant woman may cause amniotic fluid leakage rather urinary incontinence . Subjects arrive hospital receive single AL-SENSE use notice wetness . The blinded physician perform diagnosis accord standard diagnostic method ( clinical assessment ) . The standard diagnostic method include follow test : ( 1 ) Pooling test , ( 2 ) Ferning test , ( 3 ) pH test pH paper . A positive Pooling test positive result pH test Ferning test define positive clinical assessment .
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , comparative , prospective pivotal study demonstrate AL-SENSE indicate whether wetness sense pregnant woman may cause amniotic fluid leakage rather urinary incontinence . Subjects arrive hospital reporting unidentified wetness ( undetermined whether amniotic fluid leakage urinary incontinence ) receive single AL-SENSE use 12 hour notice wetness . The clinician explain proper use handle AL-SENSE . In case , blind clinician require read record occurrence color change AL-SENSE 10 minute AL-SENSE removal mark change color blue green designate form . The blinded physician ( clinician record AL-SENSE result ) perform diagnosis accord standard diagnostic method ( clinical assessment ) . The standard diagnostic method include follow test : ( 1 ) Pooling test , ( 2 ) Ferning test , ( 3 ) pH test pH paper . A positive Pooling test positive result pH test Ferning test define positive clinical assessment . In case AL-SENSE show positive result clinical assessment result negative , reference laboratory , standard procedure check possibility BV Trichomonas addition test note .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year great . 2 . Subject minimum 16 week pregnancy . 3. Who sign inform consent form . 4. Who arrive obstetric department report feel vaginal wetness feeling ( undetermined whether amniotic fluid leakage urinary incontinence ) . 1 . Subject experienced intermittent vaginal bleeding 2nd 3rd trimester . 2 . Subjects sexual intercourse within last 12 hour . 3 . Subject unable unwilling cooperate study procedure . 4 . Subject diagnosed Bacterial Vaginosis Trichomonas infection within last 3 day .
